text: Teacher Joy is a very professional piano instructor, especially in teaching junior students. She always makes the teaching plan fun and fit for my girl. Also she is very patient and passionate and put a lot of extra effort to guide and help my girl conquer those  difficult pieces. I feel greatly blessed to have Ms Joy as my girl's piano instructor!

Absolutely thrilled with my piano lessons from Joy! Her teaching style is engaging and tailored to my skill level, making every session enjoyable. Joy’s patience and passion for music shine through, helping me progress quickly. She offers valuable feedback and encourages creativity, making learning feel effortless. I highly recommend Joy to anyone looking to improve their piano skills—she truly makes music come alive!

Teacher Joy has great patience when teaching piano. She rewards student with points and gifts, which makes great motivation for my girl to practise. Parent receives progress update after every lesson! Rescheduling also done conveniently so no lesson get wasted.

Teacher Joy is a very passionate piano teacher. My boys enjoyed her lessons and she always put in extra effort to make the lesson fun for them and keep their passion on. She is a very patient teacher and I am grateful that we found a nice teacher for the kids.

Teacher Joy makes learning piano fun, interactive and rewarding. She uses methods such as games, mini challenges, rewards and multi modal tools that engage children better than just rote learning. Highly recommended for anyone who wants to learn piano
